site.title: Reza's Blog
site.subtitle:
⚡ iOS Engineer since 2016 ⚡
Shipped more than 10,000 releases for different apps weekly/monthly
Built with zero build tools: Pure HTML5 + Tailwind CSS (CDN) + jQuery (CDN)

about.name: Reza
about.achievement: Shipped more than 10,000 releases for different apps weekly/monthly
about.description: Welcome. This is Reza's personal corner of the web, an iOS Engineer who has been shipping apps since 2016. With over 10,000 releases under my belt, I write about iOS engineering, tech, and other things I find interesting.
about.note: This site works best with JavaScript enabled. Optimized for modern browsers but designed with a retro aesthetic.
